metadata.title: CVE-2021-41816 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
CGI.escape_html in Ruby before 2.7.5 and 3.x before 3.0.3 has an integeroverflow and resultant buffer overflow via a long string on platforms (suchas Windows) where size_t and long have different numbers of bytes. Thisalso affects the CGI gem before 0.3.1 for Ruby.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.6
ruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-5ubuntu1.6').
